section.p: The ship Wrath of God is indeed docked here. 'At last, someone's arrived to claim the old tub,' says the harbourmaster. 'There's fifty Shards of maintenance fees outstanding, though'.

p.if:
If you pay the
50 Shards
, note Wrath of God (you can change the name if you want), on the Ship's Manifest, and that it is docked in Kunrir. The ship is a brigantine and has a cargo capacity of 2 Cargo Units.

section.p: You will have to pay to hire a crew. gets a poor crew, buys an average crew, recruits a good crew, and will obtain an excellent crew.
When you are finished, if you have claimed the ship, cross the deed to the Wrath of God off your Adventure Sheet.
